Such a responsible king, such a heavy duty he has to perform and his position is so exalted

do no wrong in the sense that even if he does some small mistake.
He should never be considered as the object of punishment by anyone. The sage Shamika wanted
to say something about Emperor Pariksit specifically. First he spoke in general about a king who
is a responsible king should not be considered to do something wrong for a small mistake.
But now the king who has been cursed is not just a dutiful king. He is the emperor of

religious principles of the Royal Order.
